吾都沒看... 怕看了後會被洗腦洗得更傻屄...

網路上的英文電子書倒是大略翻閲過幾本的，譬如～
China’s Globalization and the Belt and Road Initiative by Jean A. Berlie
Belt and Road by Maçães Bruno
Silk Road to Belt Road - Reinventing the Past and Shaping the Future by Md. Nazrul Islam
Rethinking the Silk Road - China’s Belt and Road Initiative and Emerging Eurasian Relations edited by Maximilian Mayer
China’s Presence in the Middle East - The Implications of the One Belt, One Road Initiative edited by Anoushiravan Ehteshami, Niv Horesh
Securing the Belt and Road Initiative - Risk Assessment, Private Security and Special Insurances Along the New Wave of Chinese Outbound Investments edited by Alessandro Arduino, Xue Gong
China's Belt and Road Initiative by Wenxian Zhang, Ilan Alon, Christoph Lattemann
Mapping China’s ‘One Belt One Road’ Initiative by Li Xing
(嗯，吾皇心還真挺大的，是否 才疏志大 學淺識博 眼高手低 心厚命薄 另論，但，看來還真有學者將吾皇大撒幣砌就的春秋大夢草牆當回事來認真對待囁...)
